name: eon-ticket
effect: Provides access to southern island and either latias or latios, whichever is not available roaming around Hoenn.
short_effect: Provides access to Southern Island and Latias or Latios.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The ticket for a ferry to a distant southern island.
flavor_text.emerald: The ticket for a ferry to a distant southern island.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to a distant southern island. It features a drawing of an island.
